content.question: In the late 1800s, many Americans came to support a United States empire overseas because they

choices.label: wanted the United States to assist British and German colonization
viewed colonies as places where African Americans could be resettled
thought that importing foreign products would stimulate the United States economy
sought to spread Protestantism and Anglo-Saxon values
wanted to create a more diverse society

content.answer: sought to spread Protestantism and Anglo-Saxon values

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
